info.title: Project Lockdown
info.description:
APIs corresponding to Project Lockdown.
They serve
- Back Office (BO)
- Mapping Platform (MAP)
- Public Open Data

parameters.name: DSLUID
parameters.description: DSLID of the DSL to be loaded. 0== Default DSL / Other value == DSLUID

Environment.title: XXXEnvironment
Environment.description:
@@@
Describes the features and behavior of the environment for all the Modules.

0 = DEFAULT APP
Anything else = Other environment configurations?
We may want to consider custom environments for Users?


###Accessed by
MAP
BO
API

XXXISOInfo.description:
Describes ISO-related description fields for PLD Territories.
Information originated by the International Starndards Organization (ISO).

XXXISO2.description: Code ISO Alpha 2 of this Territory (or its parent, if territory is a subdivision).

XXXISO3.description: Code ISO Alpha 3 of this Territory (or its parent, if territory is a subdivision).

XXXUNInfo.description:
Describes UN-related description fields for PLD Territories.
Information originated by United Nations (UN).

XXXLOCODE.description: UN LOCODE code for this territory.

XXXNATOInfo.description:
Describes NATO-related description fields for PLD Territories.
Information originated by the North Atlantic Treaty Organization (NATO).

XXXWikiMediaInfo.description: Describes WikiMedia-related description fields for PLD Territories.

XXXMapboxInfo.description:
Describes Mapbox-related description fields for PLD Territories.
Information originated by Mapbox (Map platform provider).

XXXPermalinkDocs.description: Permalink to the documentation explaining this object.

XXXTerritories.description: List of sub territories that compose this territory.

XXXOrigins.description: List of Origins that are linked to this Territory.

Stats.description:
List of Stats for this Territory.

@@@Indicate the list of Stats


@@@Make sure all these are in the Stat.StatType enumerator.

XXXGeneratedBy.description:
Indicates what did generated the value in the field.

Options:
- Funnel: The value was introduced by the funnel process
- Algorithm: The value was inferred by an algorithm in the back end when saving the field.


The Log indicates who did the operation.

@@@Highlights.description: Set of xyz coordinates that identify the snippet of text in the Source that explains this information.

Order.description: Indicates the render order of this category in the DSL.

DataSetLayer.title: XXX DataSet Layer (DSL)
DataSetLayer.description:
Describes PLD DataSet Layers.
A DataSet Layer (DSL) is a collection of DataPoints (DP) that are selected to track the impact of a specific family of policies that may impact Human and/or Digital Rights. They are composed of a series of child objects formed by metadata and actual policy information encoded following a DSL-specific methodology.


###Accessed by
MAP
BO
API


#DUBIOUS FIELDS
MethodologyCode
Extra information inside the Methodology.

@@@AccessLevel
Indicates the access conditions for this DSL

LicenseCode
Extra information inside the Licensing.

CitingPolicyCode
Extra information inside the Citing.

DSLUID.description: Indicates the UID for this DSL inside PLD.

Type.description: Indicates if it is Thematic, Transversal or External.

MaxBoundary.description: Max Boundary considered in this DSL.

SourceTypes.description: Array of IDs for Source Types, ordered by their default order of application for the Snapshots.

Tags.description: String of Hashtags separated by coma to group DSLs - To be used on searches.

Territories.description: The Territory this Source applies to.

Funnel.description: Indicates which Funnel was use to produce this DataSet Entry.

SourceType.title: XXX SourceType
SourceType.description:
@@@
Defines the types of sources from where Sources are extracted and/or generated. This applies to all data, from the one generated for PLD to external providers.

Type.description:
@@@

The type of Source.

Options:
- Government
- Media
- NGO
- Foreign Mission
- Other

Also to be used used for APIs and other external providers.

Region.title: Regions
Region.description:
@@@
PLD regions

- Africa
- Asia
- Europe
- Middle East
- Latin America
- North America

Missing: Pacific - No assigned TLD seems to be available


See documentation on how to use the TLDs for localization.

XXXMAPInfo.description: Stores all specs for that region per mapping provider.

Origin.title: Origin
Origin.description:
@@@
All the info about Origin of Sources.
Can be seen as Providers.

TimeMachine.title: TimeMachine
TimeMachine.description: Objects describing all the different Time Machines used to back up Sources.

Snapshot.title: Snapshot
Snapshot.description:
@@@

Snapshots are generated for all data to be represented in MAP, regardless of their Origin type.

It stores a whole



- Each DSL has a FirstDate and and LastDate
- When creating a new DSL, all DPs get a Snapshot PER SourceType that is initialized.
- Compression applied(?)
- When a new DP is entered for a specific SourceType then
    - All such snapshots are recalculated
- When a new DP is entered with StartDate < FirstDate then
    - All Snapshots of that DSL are expanded "to the left"
    - FirstDate = StartDate
    - All such snapshots are recalculated
- When a new DP is entered with LastDate < EndDate then
    - All Snapshots of that DSL are expanded "to the right"
    - LastDate = EndDate 
    - All such snapshots are recalculated

Note:
Recalculating Snapshots can be done
- Triggered on the spot
- Scheduled
- Scheduled with execution triggered by some flag or a pending queue

@@@Note2:
We need to look into compression while being able to filter PER DATE RANGE unless we download ALL the range since it would be compressed.


###DUBIOUS FIELDS
XXXTimeRange
THIS MAY NOT BE NEEDED IF WE CONSIDER FIRSTDATE & LASTDATE FROM THE DSL
Prepopulated.
The range extends from 
- FirstDate
to
- LastDate
for EACH DSL.

TabMenu.description: Describes the features and behavior of the Tab Menu (TB) in MAP.

Show.description:
- Description: Controls if the TabMenu is shown.
  - QS Parameter:  
  - QS Implemented:  
  - QS Required:  
  - Notes:

Position.description:
- Description: Indicates in which position the menu is to be rendered.
  - QS Parameter: TabMenuPosition
  - QS Implemented: @@@ VERIFY
  - QS Required: NO
  - Notes: This parameter can also be set  as per user is left handed or right handed on the Settings (TO BE IMPLEMENTED)

TimeSlider.description: Defines the features and behavior of the Time Slider (TS) in MAP.

CategoryUID.description: In which category the TDO should open.

Behavior.description:
Description: Controls the behavior of the Territory Details Overlay (TDO).
  QS Parameter: MapTDOBehavior
  QS Implemented: @@@ VERIFY
  QS Required: NO
  Notes: 
    
      OnTap
    Note:"
    - Meaning: TDO opens as per user's interaction (Default).
    - Notes: Standard TDO behavior.
    
    No 
    Note:"
    - Meaning: TDO can't be opened.
    - Notes: Implies WATERMARK ON.
    
    Forced
    Note:"
    - Meaning: TDO is open on loadng.
    - Notes: Forcefully opens the TDO on page load.
    - IMPORTANT: Implies PLDCode and Panel params mandatory.
Behavior.example: OnTap  [     Note:"     - Meaning: TDO opens as per user's interaction (Default).     - Notes: Standard TDO behavior.     "]          No [     Note:"     - Meaning: TDO can't be opened.     - Notes: Implies WATERMARK ON.     "]          Forced [     Note:"     - Meaning: TDO is open on loadng.     - Notes: Forcefully opens the TDO on page load.     - IMPORTANT: Implies PLDCode and Panel params mandatory.
